name: adulatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing great admiration or praise for someone, especially when it is more than is deserved: I found myself irritated by the adulatory tone of her biography. The Mother Teresa article is adulatory. See
adulation
More examplesFewer examplesThe crowd at Friday's rally was adulatory.After a parade of adulatory speeches from committee members, he fielded questions. He is less than adulatory of the Smithsonian Institute.
